sys_hub_flow.name: HCL New Employee Onboarding

sys_hub_flow_input.label: Request Item
sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_104622e04744711098f58977536d4398

sys_hub_flow_input.label: Table Name
sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_104622e04744711098f58977536d4398

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: If the manager approves the request, we will create a catalog task of raising a new laptop issuance request for the onboardee and assign it to respective resolver group.

sys_variable_value.value: assignment_group={"display":"HCL Laptop Issuance","value":"dc727c394737211098f58977536d435a","sys_id":"dc727c394737211098f58977536d435a"}^description=Please issue a company laptop for the requested onboardee at the earliest as a part of employee's onboarding process.^priority=2
This task is assigned to HCL Laptop Issuance team for issuing a new company laptop to the onboarded employee. Please fulfil at the earliest.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: As soon as the service request is raised, an already registered event named "newOnboardingServiceRequested" will be fired. This event will cause a notification to be sent to the RM.
If the manager approves the request, we will create a catalog task of creating O365 Mailbox for the onboardee and assign it to respective resolver group.

sys_variable_value.value: assignment_group={"display":"HCL O365 Mailbox Creation","value":"f98430b94737211098f58977536d43c0","sys_id":"f98430b94737211098f58977536d43c0"}^description=Please create the MS Office 365 Mailbox Account for the requested onboardee at the earliest as a part of employee's onboarding process.^priority=2
This task is assigned to O365 Team for Mailbox creation of onboarded employee. Please fulfil at the earliest.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: If the manager approves the request, we will create a catalog task of raising the ODC access request for the onboardee and assign it to respective resolver group.

sys_variable_value.value: assignment_group={"display":"HCL ODC Access","value":"ea147cfd47f3211098f58977536d4385","sys_id":"ea147cfd47f3211098f58977536d4385"}^description=Please fulfil the ODC Access request for the new onboardee at the earliest as a part of employee's onboarding process.^priority=2
This task is assigned to HCL ODC Access team for providing the ODC access to the newly onboarded employee. Please fulfil at the earliest.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: First and foremost we need access to the variables of the "Newly Onboarded Employee's Details" Catalog Item. So we will get those variables.

variable.display_value: Template Catalog Items and Variable Sets

sys_hub_sub_flow_instance.comment: When the service request is raised, an approval request will be sent to the RM of the onboardee.

sys_hub_sub_flow_instance_inputs.label: Wait For Completion
sys_hub_sub_flow_instance_inputs.name: var__m_sys_hub_sub_flow_instance_inputs_6e75018d474cb11098f58977536d432c

sys_variable_value.value: Requested Item is Rejected By Manager
